text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text:
—— I see. So you wanted to learn more about 
my mental space was when I was active… right?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Um… father, you said you had a rival, can you tell us about him? You said you two were always competing with each other…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: I want to hear everything about your rivalry. I want to know how you two pushed each other… helped each other!

text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text:
Helped each other? 
Ha ha… Well, it might've been like that in the end, but…

text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text: More important was the fact we didn't want to lose to each other, it was nothing more than us butting heads… Yeah, we had some arguments better left in the dark.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Huh, arguments!? W-… with each other!?

text_block_list.name: Father's Rival
text_block_list.text:
How about complaining after doing everything you could've? 
You can't complain if you don't at least try.

text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text: If you got the time to nitpick me, why don't you reflect on the mistakes you made yesterday?

text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text:
You see, Shion. We were—— that serious. 
So serious that, at times, we were covered in an ugly pitch black feeling.

text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text:
We wanted nothing else but to claim that role of principal. 
We craved it… went mad over it.

text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text:
It's not a place that you can have moral values in. 
Everything… we took anything in sight and turned it all into strength.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…Even if it's ugly and dirty… 
take it all and turn it into…

text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text:
Yes, However, there was something I really, 
really, absolutely yearned to obtain…
On the way back and even after we arrived, Win Variation was deep in thought. Then—

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Trainer… um…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: My running. Could you… Do you mind watching me run just one more time? I'll do it now.
choice_data_list: Of course. I really want to see it.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah, hah, hah!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: (For so long… I've been suppressing it. Telling myself to focus and run straight ahead. That this wasn't the time to be engulfed by these horrible feelings…)

As if she was struggling till the end, she gritted her teeth. 
I wanted to, give that girl one final push… so I yelled—
choice_data_list: Shout, Shion! All of it— turn it into your strength!
Shout, Shion! All of it— turn it into your strength!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Ha!!… Grrrraaaaaaaaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Damn it! Damn it! Damn it! DAMN IT! 
ORFEVRE… ORFEVREEEEE!!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: I HATE YOU! I REAAALLY HATE YOU! WHAT'S THIS ABOUT A KING!? WHO'S A CITIZEN!? EVERY… SINGLE… TIME! YOU'RE ALWAYS… LOOKING DOWN ON MEEEE!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I'LL TEAR YOU DOWN! I'LL KNOCK YOU DOWN!! 
WHO DO YOU THINK… 
JUST WHO THE HELL DO YOU THINK YOU ARE!?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I'LL BEAT YOU!! THEN I'LL BE THE ONE LOOKING DOWN ON YOU!! 
YOUR GOLDEN RADIANCE, WILL BE A SMEARED 
MESS WHEN I'M THROUGH WITH YOU!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: THE PRINCIPAL IS!! MEEEEEEEEE!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Puwah, hah… Hah, hah… 
Pheeeew…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
H-huh… wha!? 
A-amazing… It got shorter!!
choice_data_list: You turned all of it into your own strength.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Trainer…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ah, ha ha. I went a bit too far there, but that was… 
my true feelings… I feel quite refreshed now.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…… 
…Thank you… very much.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …Um, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Can you… can you become my trainer!?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Everything I wanted to shout out, and now laid out to the world… you noticed it all along! I, until now, have been just waiting to be chosen by someone.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: "If I just kept focused and put in all my power to keep going… Someone would certainly notice me.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Someone would one day… 
Choose me" I was so sure of it.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: But, it wasn't like that at all… Not like that at all. It never happened. Something like "I hope one day someone picks me"… never came true.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I want to… choose you. 
For myself.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I-I won't let you say no! I mean… 
you just saw my running now, right!?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I-I want to… become the principal! 
I want to shine brighter than everyone else… 
at the center of my generation!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: I won't let you say that you don't want to see it!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Uh… mmm… ……

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
S-so… um, what do… you think? 
I'm sorry, something like this was impossible—
I was secretly smiling at the flustered Win Variation.
The truth was, I was going to ask her the question myself, but… since she was the one who chose me, I decided to keep silent.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …Trainer?
choice_data_list: I want to see it… You become the principal.
I want to see it… You become the principal.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Ha! Ah…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Yes… yes, of course!! 
I'll show you, I absolutely will!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Everything that's in my chest, I'll turn it into strength— 
One day, I'll definitely become the principal!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Hehe. When that time comes, I'll prepare you a special VIP seat. Together we'll be bathed in applause and cheers… That'll be our stage!

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Hm…

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Oh my, what is it? 
You have— such a pleased expression.

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text:
…… 
…Just—

text_block_list.name: Orfevre
text_block_list.text: Something… trivial.
